name: 90 Minutes
summary: Players have the freedom to select from over 32 national teams, as well as club teams from major leagues across Europe and around the world. There is a choice of club teams from the English, French, German, Italian and Spanish leagues. Players may challenge for the World Championship (based on the World Cup) or compete for title glory in a Domestic League competition. The game also features in-game commentary from British television and radio commentator Alan Parry.
